alert.note: Alert for Noatak Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 2:54PM AKST until December 07 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Visibilities as low as one half mile at times. * WHERE...Noatak Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will develop today and continue into early Thursday. The worst conditions are expected this afternoon evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
